entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Access Violation starting with .NET 8.0.0 when debugging console application with Visual Studio on Windows x64 #96322
  • Cast to nullable integer surprisingly fails on non-integers #96314
  • JsonSourceGenerator InvalidOperationException Unreachable with C# 12 using alias #96313

Closed

  • Api Proposal: Enumerable.Type() extension #29809
    Future
  • Clean up ifdefs in EventSource #90433
    9.0.0
  • WinHttpHandler assertion failure #90613
    Future
  • Several XML tests are sporadically failing in CI due to OOMs #82894
    9.0.0
  • Explore using Aho-Corasick in Regex's FindFirstChar #62447
    9.0.0
  • Consider adding more IndexOf variations #75175
    Future
  • Delete redundant vectorization code paths #49846
    Future
  • Consider Android development Codespace #77851
    9.0.0
  • ObjectDisposedException from FileConfigurationProvider in net8.0 #96282
  • Unhandled error: System.IO.FileLoadException: Could not load file or assembly 'System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource, Version=6.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=cc7b13ffcd2ddd51' or one of its dependencies. The located assembly's manifest definition does not match the assembly reference. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80131040) #95000
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Build Linux NativeAOT runtime packs #96323
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] JSImport dispatch to target thread via JSSynchronizationContext #96319
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Merged

  • [ILCompiler] Fix formatting error in EHClause.WriteTo #96317
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix typo in GetTypeNameDebug #96320
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [ILLink] Fix cut & paste error in IsTypeOf #96316
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Remove double check for context.Target.PointerSize == 4 #96318
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create a Codespace for Android development #96257
    area-Meta, os-android

Updated

  • [RISC-V] Add crossgen2 for riscv64 #95188
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • A few optimizations for the gcinfodecoder construction #96150
    tenet-performance, area-VM-coreclr
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Faster lookup for method infos on Windows. #96283
    os-windows, tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP & WS #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Cleanup some string operating functions #96099
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Precise reflection-visible delegate target analysis #96166
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Update Marshal.QueryInterface() argument modifier (take 2) #94470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • PGO: Profile Buffer.Memmove's length #96311
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETSDKE2E]With net9 sdk inserted, Running winforms/wpf failed in CLI. #37657

Closed

  • [NETSDKE2E][Unstable]Failed to download package 'Microsoft.NETCore.app.Runtime.win-x64.8.0.0' from ..." message displays during publish project in CLI. #37658
  • Failed to create CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80070008 #37661

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.2xx] Handle HTTP 403 Forbidden in Containers #37660
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Handle HTTP 403 Forbidden in Containers #37659
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Default naming rules (IDE1006) have to be defined explicitly if custom rules are used #71414

Closed

  • Minimize using extension methods #71306

PullRequests

Created

  • Change MapCode protocol to match it's form in VS #71415
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • Remove WPF dependencies from Workspace and Features test layers #71392
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Provide 'return' keyword in attribute context for accessor #71288
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • #66116 Long switch expression is duplicated in InferTypesWorker_DoNot… #71412
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SignalR - Getting user claims through dependency injection #53014
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, multiple_queries, plaintext #53010

Closed

  • Perf regression: caching #53011
  • Parameters from Static Server component to WebAssembly component fail when parameter type defined in separate project #53013
  • CSS block in `Blazor` component #53012
  • HTTP2_PROTOCOL_ERR #52891
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudDeleteProduct #52999
  • Perf improvement: mvc, updates #52997

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] [Blazor] Fix duplicated place holder in log message #53009
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 6.0.x

Merged

  • Reenable HTTPs tests #52967
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, 9.0-preview1

Updated

  • Supporting pseudo-element attribute in css link fallback (#38146) #51396
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Set IExceptionHandlerFeature on DeveloperExceptionPageMiddleware #52688
    feature-diagnostics, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-middleware

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Span LineHeight Wrong on Android #19592
  • Rework/rename/delete IMauiInitializeScopedService #19591
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows]Crash when using a large number of CheckBoxes #19590
  • MAUI Blazor # Android system uses USB device app to reload and then black screen #19589

Closed

  • Net7 and Net8 Android projects with AndroidLibrary try to generate binding instead of add it as reference like Xamarin project does #19569
  • Resolve services in ViewHandler is not working #5056
    Backlog
  • [Android][iOS] OnDestroying method of the Window extended class is not called [Lifecycle] #6993
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove calls to scoped services on root provider #19593

Updated

  • Validate service provider scopes #18492
    area/hosting 🧩
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19577
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-12-26
entry.content:
